sources.title: The Human Monster
sources.description: Title: The Human Monster Summary: Insurance agent-physician collects on policies of men murdered by a disfigured resident of the home for the blind where he acts as doctor-on-call. Directed by: Walter Summers Actors: Bela Lugosi, Hugh Williams, Greta Gynt Production Company: John Argyle Productions Release Date: 24 March 1940 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A series of strange deaths takes place in London. All are accidents but the victims are single men with no family and they all have a link to a life insurance company run by the mysterious Dr. Orloff.

sources.title: The Human Monster (1939) BELA LUGOSI
sources.description:
CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Hugh Williams, Greta Gynt
Director: Walter Summers
Writer: Edgar Wallace (novel)

The Godfather of PizzaFLIX Bela Lugosi takes center stage in this Creepy Classic Thriller set during pre-war London.

metadata.Plot: A series of strange deaths takes place in London. All are accidents but the victims are single men with no family and they all have a link to a life insurance company run by the mysterious Dr. Orloff.
metadata.Writer: Edgar Wallace, Patrick Kirwan, Walter Summers
metadata.Actors: Bela Lugosi, Hugh Williams, Greta Gynt
